title: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473 - ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When executing the ShiftLeft command on lines that contain an intermix of tabs and spaces, nothing happens.
EB: After executing the ShiftLeft command on lines that contain an intermix of tabs and spaces, the lines should be indented to the left by one tab or four spaces.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Open a default text editor. 2. Type in the following lines: 
<space>
<tab>some text
<tab>some text2
3. Highlight the two lines above. 4. Execute the ShiftLeft command. 

Expected result: The lines should be indented to the left by one tab or four spaces.
